name: LONDON STOCK EXCHANGE GROUP PLC
description: Bond, equity and derivatives markets and post-trade and risk management services.
sampleDescriptions: Implementation of the "Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act," including regulation of derivative instruments, regulation and capitalization of clearinghouses, protection of customer assets, and extraterritorial application; and H.R.238, the "Commodity End-User Relief Act."
